tool_description: A random password/passcode generator that can select from over trillions different options, and is almost impossible to crack!
name: Password/Code Generator
title: Password/Code Generator

api_list.name: password/code generator
api_list.description: This endpoint processes the info you give it to make a completely random password/code.

required_parameters.name: include-special-characters
required_parameters.description: type **yes** to include special characters (ie, !@#$%^&*_+-=|<;>:`~), or type **no** to exclude

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://password-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com/pass/16/yes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://password-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com/pass/{length}/{include_special_characters}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
